sentence.Network_cn: 那是个愚蠢透顶的讨论。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin asininus, from asinus 'ass'

entry.def: If you describe something or someone as asinine, you mean that they are very foolish.

auth_sentence.content: Most of those representing the IPCC are NOT climatologists, but mere politicos furthering an asinine theory.

auth_sentence.content: Putting pressure on the world's food supply to satisfy our excessive fuel consumption is asinine.
